title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, August 29, 2020
description: It was on this day 15 years ago that Hurricane Katrina hit the Gulf Coast near New Orleans. More than 80% of the city was eventually flooded.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day 15 years ago that Hurricane Katrina hit the Gulf Coast near New Orleans. More than 80% of the city was eventually flooded.
